property.name: df_LT.description
property.value: The JDK Mission Control RCP feature contains all the Mission Control features and plug-ins needed to run Mission Control as an RCP application.

property.name: df_LT.description
property.value: The JDK Mission Control RCP feature contains all the Mission Control features and plug-ins needed to run Mission Control as an RCP application.
